text: The Suit (Russian: Шик) is a 2003 internationally comedy-drama movie directed by Bakhtyar Khudojnazarov and was based on the 1958 short story The Wonderful Ice Cream Suit by Ray Bradbury. It stars Ivan Kokorin, Aleksandr Yatsenko, Artur Smolyaninov, Ingeborga Dapkūnaitė, Ruslana Rukhadze, Andrei Panin, Elena Drobysheva. ==Other websites== * Category:2003 comedy-drama movies Category:Tajik movies Category:Russian comedy movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:German comedy movies Category:German drama movies Category:French comedy movies Category:French drama movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Ukrainian movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Bakhtyar Khudojnazarov
title: The Suit (2003 movie)
